text: Bazoba hamagara ba babwire bati:- mbega ntitwari kumwe namwe? Nabo bazobishura bati:- egome, mugabo mwebwe nimwe mwijanye mubu hakanyi nu kurindira yuko amabi ashikira aba Isilamu, namwe muca mwitera amakenga n’ivyipfuzo vy’imitima yanyu yipfuza vyabahenze, kugeza naho itegeko ry’Imana ryaba shikira, n’umubeshi arabahenda kunkuru z’Imana
